00017 ## @package app
00018 #  Contains a class defining the main application window.
00019 #
00020 #  The main application instance require the settings, model and state objects.   
00021 
00022 from xml.dom import minidom
00023 
00024 import os 
00025 import tkinter
00026 import tkinter.tix

00028 import GUI.widgets.menu
00029 import GUI.widgets.uptoolbox
00030 import GUI.widgets.canvas
00031 import GUI.widgets.XMLeditor

00033 # generate application window
00034 
00035 class Application(tkinter.tix.Tk):
00036     """Main app window. Everything starts here.
00037        Keeps the main widgets (menu, upper and right toolbar, console, canvas, XML editor, etc.
00038        Initialises or uses the (common) settings object, the state object and the model object."""
00039     def __init__(self, settings, model, state):
00040         tkinter.tix.Tk.__init__(self)
00041         # load registered settings and default empty state (menu)
00042         
00043         self.settings = settings
00044         self.model    = model
00045         self.state    = state
00046         
00047         self.xmlPaths=None  # ????
00048         self.modulePaths=[] # other directories to import modules from ????
00049 
00050         self.xmlprojfiles={"trunk":    None,
00051                            "geometry": None,
00052                            "mesh":     None} # ???? maybe I should move this 
00053 
00054         self.projState = None # if the app starts with a new project, no project, a previously opened one, etc ... TODO
00055                               # with influence on self.settings (some menu entries have to be disabled with respect to
00056                               # the settings
00057 
00058         self.widgets = None # holds all widgets in an unified way - maybe in a clear to follow tree ????
00059 
00060         self.menuBar=None
00061 
00062         self.upperFrame=None # general buttons like zoom, new, save, entity hierarchy, open editor (xml, python),
00063 
00064         self.canvasFrame=None # left toolbox + cad widget
00065         self.notebook=None
00066         self.leftFrame=None
00067         self.DrawingArea=None
00068         self.XMLeditor=None
00069 
00070         self.lowerConsole=None # with tabs possibility
00071         self.lowerLabelFrame=None # has priority when determining the windows size
00072         self.lowerLabel=None
00073         self.lowerlabelstr=[]
00074 
00075         self.AppTitle=tkinter.StringVar()
00076         self.AppTitle.set("")
00077 
00078         self.readXML() # ??? - settings ???
00079         self.createApp()
00080 
00081     def createApp(self):
00082         self.menuBar=GUI.widgets.menu.MenuToolbar(self,
00083                                                   self.settings["menuXMLPath"],
00084                                                   self.settings["menuIconsPath"])
00085 
00086         self.upperFrame=GUI.widgets.uptoolbox.UpperToolbox(self,
00087                                                            self.settings["upperToolBoxXMLPath"],
00088                                                            self["upperToolBoxIconsPath"])
00089 
00090         self.notebook=tkinter.tix.NoteBook(self)
00091         self.notebook.pack(side="top", fill="both", expand="yes")
00092 
00093         # more like testing purpose
00094         self.lowerLabelFrame=tkinter.Frame(self, borderwidth=0)
00095         self.lowerLabelFrame.pack(side="top", fill="x")
00096         self.lowerlabelstr.append(tkinter.StringVar())
00097         self.lowerLabel=tkinter.Label(self.lowerLabelFrame, textvariable=self.lowerlabelstr[0], relief="sunken")
00098         self.lowerLabel.pack(side="bottom", fill="x")
00099 
00100         # bindings
00101 
00102         self.geometry('%sx%s+0+0' % self.maxsize())
00103 
00104         self.title(self.AppTitle.get())
00105         self.update_idletasks()
00106         self.mainloop()
00107 
00108     def initDrawingArea(self): # should be called after the other widgets are initialiazed.
00109 
00110         self.notebook.add(name="canvas", label="Drawing Area")
00111 
00112         self.DrawingArea=GUI.widgets.canvas.DrawingArea(self, os.path.join(self.basedir, "etc/gui/canvas.xml")) # add setting to settings instance
00113         self.DrawingArea.pack(fill="both", expand="yes", in_=self.notebook.canvas)
00114         self.update_idletasks()
00115 
00116         self.DrawingArea.bind("<Motion>", self.__cb_lowerlabel, add="+")
00117 
00118         self.notebook.add(name="xml", label="XML")
00119         self.XMLeditor=GUI.widgets.XMLeditor.XMLeditor(self, os.path.join(self.basedir, "etc/gui/XMLeditor.xml")) # add setting to settings instance
00120         self.XMLeditor.pack(fill="both", expand="yes", in_=self.notebook.xml)
00121         self.XMLeditor.insert(tkinter.END, 
00122                               self.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][0].toprettyxml(indent = '   ', 
00123                                                                            encoding=self.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][0].encoding))
00124 
00125 
00126     def readXML(self):
00127         self.xmlPaths=minidom.parse(os.path.join(self.basedir, "etc/paths.xml"))
00128 
00129         for i in self.xmlPaths.getElementsByTagName('ModPath'):
00130             self.modulePaths.append(i.firstChild.data)
00131 
00132         self.lwd=os.path.join(self.basedir, self.xmlPaths.getElementsByTagName("LastWorkingDir")[0].firstChild.data)
00133 
00134     def __cb_lowerlabel(self, event): # to be transformed in a full class widget
00135         self.lowerlabelstr[0].set("x_int = %d, y_int = %d" % (event.x, event.y))
